thread.title: Very nice hotel - very well located
thread.title_full: Very nice hotel - very well located - Review of Dharma Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: mmazmy
title: Very nice hotel - very well located
text:
Rooms are very modern .. a bit tight and would have been perfect with a bit more space
Location is very well located to center of town
Highly recommended to use for short visits
Staff are generally friendly
Room Tip: Get a room with street view See more room tips
